data.answer: EDTPN acts as a ligand to bind Ag(I) ions.

data.question: Which compound undergoes an anion-induced transformation of supramolecular structure?

What is the publication year of the article?

data.answer: Self-assembly of AgX with ethylenediaminetetrapropionitrile (EDTPN) in MeOH.

data.question: Which compound has a 2-D layer structure?

data.answer: It induces transformation of the supramolecular structure.

data.question: Can the crystal of compound 2 maintain its crystallinity after anion exchange?
data.answer: True, although its transparency is lost.

data.question: What is the significance of the study's findings?
data.answer: The study demonstrates quantitative anion-exchange in the crystalline state and accompanying supramolecular structural transformations.
